Here's the official message I got from yahoo about Monday's outage:

Monday March 4 10:45 a.m. EST (GMT-5) Groups suffered a hardware   
failure which caused the site to go down for 24 hours. 

We repaired the system and brought the service back online Tuesday   
March 5 9:30 a.m. EST (GMT-5). 

One side effect of being down for this period of time is that there   
is a backlog in email deliveries. All email sent to your group should 
be delivered, so please do not resend email to your group. The system 
is currently working to clear up that backlog. 

We apologize for the inconvenience. We would have liked to have 
notified you in advance, but this was an unplanned outage. 


The Yahoo! Groups Team
